item.title: Superbody headed by PM Modi to drive Mission Ganga
item.description: The NDA governments policy to clean the Ganga is likely to be administered by a powerfulnbspbody headed by PM Modi with the private sector playing a vital role in delivery according to a preliminary plan
item.itunes:subtitle: The NDA governments policy to clean the Ganga is likely to be administered by a powerfulnbspbody headed by PM Modi with the private sector playing a vital role in delivery according to a preliminary plan
item.itunes:summary: The NDA governments policy to clean the Ganga is likely to be administered by a powerfulnbspbody headed by PM Modi with the private sector playing a vital role in delivery according to a preliminary plan

item.title: Vijayawada or Kurnool Dispute over Andhra capital hots up
item.description: Andhra Pradesh chief minister Nara Chandrababu Naidus resolution to make Vijayawada the ad hoc centre of his government has exposed the regional divide within the state
item.itunes:subtitle: Andhra Pradesh chief minister Nara Chandrababu Naidus resolution to make Vijayawada the ad hoc centre of his government has exposed the regional divide within the state
item.itunes:summary: Andhra Pradesh chief minister Nara Chandrababu Naidus resolution to make Vijayawada the ad hoc centre of his government has exposed the regional divide within the state

item.title: After Ladakh visit army chief Dalbir Singh shifts focus to eastern sector
item.description: Army chief General Dalbir Singh has sharpened his focus on the eastern sector after touring incursionprone pockets along the disputed Line of Actual Control LAC in the sensitive Ladakh area of Jammu and Kashmir
item.itunes:subtitle: Army chief General Dalbir Singh has sharpened his focus on the eastern sector after touring incursionprone pockets along the disputed Line of Actual Control LAC in the sensitive Ladakh area of Jammu and Kashmir
item.itunes:summary: Army chief General Dalbir Singh has sharpened his focus on the eastern sector after touring incursionprone pockets along the disputed Line of Actual Control LAC in the sensitive Ladakh area of Jammu and Kashmir

item.title: RSS finds firm footing among backward castes in West Bengal
item.description: RSS chief Mohanrao Bhagwat who was as involved in the BJP victory as anybody else conducted a 20day training session for his volunteers who are supposed to fight the ruling Trinamool Congress and its alleged policy of minority appeasement
item.itunes:subtitle: RSS chief Mohanrao Bhagwat who was as involved in the BJP victory as anybody else conducted a 20day training session for his volunteers who are supposed to fight the ruling Trinamool Congress and its alleged policy of minority appeasement
item.itunes:summary: RSS chief Mohanrao Bhagwat who was as involved in the BJP victory as anybody else conducted a 20day training session for his volunteers who are supposed to fight the ruling Trinamool Congress and its alleged policy of minority appeasement

item.title: Maharashtra Narayan Rane no show at Cong meet to screen assembly poll candidates
item.description: One of Congress senior leaders Narayan Rane stayed away from the first meeting on Sunday of the poll panel to screen candidates for the assembly elections barely two months away
item.itunes:subtitle: One of Congress senior leaders Narayan Rane stayed away from the first meeting on Sunday of the poll panel to screen candidates for the assembly elections barely two months away
item.itunes:summary: One of Congress senior leaders Narayan Rane stayed away from the first meeting on Sunday of the poll panel to screen candidates for the assembly elections barely two months away

item.title: Lalu Prasad Nitish strive for synergy in Bihar
item.description: Foes turned political friends RJDs Lalu Prasad and JD Us Nitish Kumar on Sunday sought to show their reunion was working on their second outing as political partners
item.itunes:subtitle: Foes turned political friends RJDs Lalu Prasad and JD Us Nitish Kumar on Sunday sought to show their reunion was working on their second outing as political partners
item.itunes:summary: Foes turned political friends RJDs Lalu Prasad and JD Us Nitish Kumar on Sunday sought to show their reunion was working on their second outing as political partners

item.title: AAP fears extinction in pollbound Jharkhand
item.description: With the assembly polls approaching in Jharkhand fear of extinction looms large in the state unit of the Aam Aadmi Party AAP One section of the party is particularly disappointed as AAP is not likely to contest the polls
item.itunes:subtitle: With the assembly polls approaching in Jharkhand fear of extinction looms large in the state unit of the Aam Aadmi Party AAP One section of the party is particularly disappointed as AAP is not likely to contest the polls
item.itunes:summary: With the assembly polls approaching in Jharkhand fear of extinction looms large in the state unit of the Aam Aadmi Party AAP One section of the party is particularly disappointed as AAP is not likely to contest the polls

item.title: DGCA directs airlines to ensure courteous behaviour to fliers
item.description: Regular complaints by passengers against rude behaviour of ground staff of various airlines have forced the Directorate General of Civil Aviation DGCA to ask airlines to ensure polite and courteous behaviour towards travellers

item.title: Delhi Airports quarantine facility now functional for suspected Ebola cases
item.description: The quarantinecumisolation health facility at Delhi Airport has been made functional and all suspect cases of the Ebola Virus Disease detected at Delhi Airport would be admitted here from now on
item.itunes:subtitle: The quarantinecumisolation health facility at Delhi Airport has been made functional and all suspect cases of the Ebola Virus Disease detected at Delhi Airport would be admitted here from now on
item.itunes:summary: The quarantinecumisolation health facility at Delhi Airport has been made functional and all suspect cases of the Ebola Virus Disease detected at Delhi Airport would be admitted here from now on

item.title: Delhis street performers on brink of oblivion
item.description: For thousands who grew up in Delhi street performers are an enduring memory of life in the 1980s and 1990s Monkey shows jugglers acrobats snake charmers and magicians were common on the city streets But today they are just a distant memory
item.itunes:subtitle: For thousands who grew up in Delhi street performers are an enduring memory of life in the 1980s and 1990s Monkey shows jugglers acrobats snake charmers and magicians were common on the city streets But today they are just a distant memory
item.itunes:summary: For thousands who grew up in Delhi street performers are an enduring memory of life in the 1980s and 1990s Monkey shows jugglers acrobats snake charmers and magicians were common on the city streets But today they are just a distant memory

item.title: Panel finds harassmentaccused Meerut DIG guilty woman cop seeks his dismissal
item.description: A committee which was formed to look into the allegation of sexual harassment at work place against DIG of Police Training School in Meerut has found the charges of woman subinspector to be true
item.itunes:subtitle: A committee which was formed to look into the allegation of sexual harassment at work place against DIG of Police Training School in Meerut has found the charges of woman subinspector to be true
item.itunes:summary: A committee which was formed to look into the allegation of sexual harassment at work place against DIG of Police Training School in Meerut has found the charges of woman subinspector to be true

item.title: Retired joker to egg Sledging on in Bihar
item.description: RJD chief Lalu Prasad is clearly miffed When his onetime friend and close colleague Ram Vilas Paswans son Chirag called him a retired joker while campaigning for the bypolls in Bihar Lalu was quick to react
item.itunes:subtitle: RJD chief Lalu Prasad is clearly miffed When his onetime friend and close colleague Ram Vilas Paswans son Chirag called him a retired joker while campaigning for the bypolls in Bihar Lalu was quick to react

item.title: MP Double murder turns out to be honour killings
item.description: Two months after the sensational murder of a teenaged couple police on Sunday said that they had solved the case as an honour killing and arrested three persons including the girls brother

item.title: These govindas break handis and religious barriers in Mumbai
item.description: The 150member team of Akhil Malpa Dongri 123 Mitra Mandal in Andheri East will not only break a pot of curd but also religious barriers More than onethird members of the nineyearold mandal are nonHindus at least 60 members are Christians Sikhs and Muslims
item.itunes:subtitle: The 150member team of Akhil Malpa Dongri 123 Mitra Mandal in Andheri East will not only break a pot of curd but also religious barriers More than onethird members of the nineyearold mandal are nonHindus at least 60 members are Christians Sikhs and Muslims

item.title: Modi should be given time to perform Raj Thackeray
item.description: MNS chief Raj Thackeray on Monday said people of the country have reposed faith in Narendra Modi in the Lok Sabha elections and he should be given some time to perform
item.itunes:subtitle: MNS chief Raj Thackeray on Monday said people of the country have reposed faith in Narendra Modi in the Lok Sabha elections and he should be given some time to perform
